body:
#### PR description:

Add files for zero material scenario of the tracker after removing tracker specific materials from materials.xml

#### PR validation:

Tested using specific cfg's in the test area of Geometry/TrackerCommonData

title: Run3-ft32 Add files for zero material scenario
